about_the_game:
Help Marco and Eva dive into the pages of colorful comics to rescue animals imprisoned by the evil Glurks.

  • Marco whistles to call for his pet dogs to charge to his aid.

  • Eva squeezes her pet birds to make them lay explosive eggs.

  • Six secondary animals that attack automatically.

  • Easy to control, with only one action button per character.

  • Four chapters and an infinite mode.

  • The chapters are procedurally generated for maximum action!

  • The destructible environment allows you to release many monsters tactically, or by mistake, causing panic.

  • Adapt your own route: will you free an animal, or will you opt for a much-needed heart to regain some health?

  • Blood can be replaced with black ink or white paint.

    Little Survivors is the first game of a solo developer inspired by Franco-Belgian comics such as Asterix, Dungeon, Kid Paddle and Game Over.

short_description: Little Survivors is a short and accessible action rogue-lite, with an emphasis on simple but satisfying combat against monsters. Enter comic book panels, free animals, then use them to attack the vile Glurks!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
